sentences.sContent: Animals representing mythical powers and military might surrounded him—pumas, a wolf, eagles, a falcon, an owl, and rattlesnakes—some buried alive in cages.
sentences.sContent_eng: Animals representing mythical powers and military might surrounded him—pumas, a wolf, eagles, a falcon, an owl, and rattlesnakes—some buried alive in cages.
sentences.sCn: 一些动物作为神和军事的力量的象征置放在他的周围——美洲狮、狼、鹰、隼、猫头鹰、响尾蛇——装在笼子里一起活埋。

words.tran: 以鹰狩猎者；放鹰者；饲养和训练猎鹰的人

trans.tranOther: a bird that kills and eats other animals and can be trained to hunt
